= Try13 rhmc with ratApprox file =



This simulation makes use of rational approximation file to do RHMC simulations(rhmc genereates the 2+1 qcd gauge configurations using HISQ)



== Inputfile.dat for ratApprox executable at "/root/project1/SIMULATeQCD/src/tools/rational_approx/ratApprox" ==

2        # number of pseudo fermion flavours

# parameters for psf1(light quark pseudo fermion determinant)
3              #y1
0             # y2
0                # preconditioning mass for strange quark determinant
0.0783706         # m_s (strange quark mass) (m_quark)
14
12
0.00614195094436        # (m_s)^{2}
5.0                   # $\lambda_{max}$   
50           # precision


# parameters for psf1(light quark pseudo fermion determinant)

2                  # y1
-2                        # y2
0.01508242900218416        # preconditioning mass (sqrt(m_l * m_s))
0.0029026             # light quark mass (m_l)
14               # order 1
12                # order2 
8.42508676e-06        # light quark mass squared
5.0                    # $\lambda_{max}$
160                   # precision
